decks.notes: This Jund Control deck focuses on using a combination of removal spells, creature threats, and planeswalkers to control the game and out-value the opponent. It leverages powerful cards like Lolth, Spider Queen, Ob Nixilis, the Adversary, and Fable of the Mirror-Breaker to generate card advantage and maintain board control. The deck also includes various lands to ensure mana consistency and to provide utility, such as providing additional creatures or boosting the power of spells. Overall, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building towards its own win condition.
